name: flickr.places.getShapeHistory
description: Return an historical list of all the shape data generated for a Places or Where on Earth (WOE) ID.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: place_id
arguments.description: A Flickr Places ID.(While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

arguments.name: woe_id
arguments.description: A Where On Earth (WOE) ID.(While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

response:
<shapes total="2" woe_id="3534" place_id="4hLQygSaBJ92" place_type="locality" place_type_id="7">
  <shapedata created="1223513357" alpha="0.012359619140625" count_points="34778" count_edges="52" is_donuthole="0">
    <polylines>
      <polyline>
            45.427627563477,-73.589645385742 45.428966522217,-73.587898254395, etc...
         </polyline>
    </polylines>
    <urls>
      <shapefile>
         http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3228/shapefiles/3534_20081111_0a8afe03c5.tar.gz
         </shapefile>
    </urls>
  </shapedata>
</shapes>

errors.title: Required parameter missingOne or more required parameter is missing from the API call.
Not a valid Places IDAn invalid Places (or WOE) ID was passed with the API call.
Place not foundNo place could be found for the Places (or WOE) ID passed to the API call.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
